question: Which of the following tribes has the Matriarchical system?
explanation: The Khasi tribe of Meghalaya and Naga tribe of nagaland is one of the few societies in the world that follows a matrilineal system. Women are the head of the household and the one who does the hard labour to earn a living for the family. Men take the back seat here. When a girl is born there are cheers of jubilation and when a boy is born, they accept it humbly as God\'s gift.
